name: Tetherball Tension
description:
Simple one button gameplay, inspired by tetherball and fighting games. Enjoy!

Keyboard Controls:
Player 1: W-Key 
Player 2: Up-Arrow-Key

Gamepad Controls:
Player 1: bottom button. (A for Xbox, B for Switch, X for Dualshock)
Player 2: Same as ^^^

Navigate Menus with the mouse.
